name: Gitxn Demo
description: A demo application to show off some of the new AVM 1.1 opcodes. These include: `itxn_next`, `gitxn`, and `gitxna`

methods.name: gitxn_demo
methods.description: Provide a demonstration of the new `itxn_next`, `gitxn`, and `gitxna`. This application will then make a series of inner transaction group transactions, making payments to provided accounts and calling foreign applications with multiple accounts in the accounts array.

args.desc: Application to call with account array data.
